subject: Re: The Bees
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I didn't believe in such things, but have to wonder if the white 
noise transistor is generating scalor waves, or some damn thing that 
effects the human mind (portals?). I still remain concerned that the 
random method may have an undesirable affect on a persons behavior, 
and so far, every user has developed what seem to weirdnesses (can't 
spell the idio word I wanted). Maybe it's just a matter of closing 
sessions, like quija board? 

 Maybe paranoid, or overly concerned, but something to think about. 

 Frank
